headline: PPL to Gain From Steady Investment in Clean Energy & Infrastructure
summary: PPL advances its long-term infrastructure and clean-energy investments as it targets major emission cuts and carbon neutrality by 2050.

headline: PPL Corporation: Still Lagging The Broader Indices, Now Below 3.2% Yield
